document.title: Inâ€‘House Training and Staff Development
document.abstract: Discusses the importance of staff development and in-house training programs for online database searching in libraries. Advantages and need of in-house programs for libraries; Different levels of in-house programs for libraries; Contents of online searching programs; Limitations of basic online search programs.
document.publication-title: School of Information Sciences -- Faculty Publications and Other Works

field.name: comments
field.value:
pp. 870-871

Reprinted in Ethel Auster, The Online Searcher, NY: Neal-Schuman, 1990, pp. 53-58.
